com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection

Class SelfStreamingInstanceChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.util.SelfStreamingInstanceChecker
      • com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.SelfStreamingInstanceChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter, ConverterMatcher
    Deprecated. 
    As of 1.4.5 use SelfStreamingInstanceChecker

    public class SelfStreamingInstanceChecker
extends com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.util.SelfStreamingInstanceChecker
    A special converter that prevents self-serialization. The serializing XStream instance adds a converter of this type to prevent self-serialization and will throw an exception instead.
    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    Jörg Schaible
